You can download code source with svn and this link:
* https://gst-plugins-elphel.googlecode.com/svn/trunk

Installation for jp462bayer, you must to do the line command : 
* ./autogen.sh
* make
* cp ~/src/gst-plugins-elphel/jp462bayer/src/.libs/libgstjp462bayer.so ~/.gstreamer-0.10/plugins$

Installation for jp462bayer, you must to do the line command : 
* ./autogen.sh
* make
* cp ~/src/gst-plugins-elphel/bayer2rgb2/src.libs/libgstbayer2rgb2.so ~/.gstreamer-0.10/plugins$

Now you can to do gst-inspect :

* gst-inspect bayer2rgb2
* gst-inspect jp462bayer
